text: José Maria dos Santos Motta (born May 27, 1939), commonly known as Zé Maria, is a former Brazilian soccer player who played in the NASL. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center" |- !rowspan="2"|Club !rowspan="2"|Season !colspan="3"|League !colspan="2"|Cup !colspan="2"|Other !colspan="2"|Total |- !Division !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals |- |rowspan="3"|Baltimore Bays |1967 |NPSL |12||0||0||0||0||0||12||0 |- |1968 |NASL |5||0||0||0||0||0||5||0 |- ! colspan="2" |Total !17!!0!!0!!0!!0!!0!!17!!0 |- |Washington Whips |1969 |NASL |2||0||0||0||0||0||2||0 |- ! colspan="3" |Career total !19!!0!!0!!0!!0!!0!!19!!0 |} ;Notes ==References== Category:Living people Category:Brazilian footballers Category:Brazilian expatriate footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:Fluminense FC players Category:Botafogo de Futebol e Regatas players Category:Bonsucesso Futebol Clube players Category:Clube Náutico Capibaribe players Category:Olaria Atlético Clube players Category:Sport Club Internacional players Category:Baltimore Bays players Category:Washington Whips players Category:National Professional Soccer League (1967) players Category:North American Soccer League (1968–1984) players Category:Expatriate soccer players in the United States Category:Brazilian expatriate sportspeople in the United States Category:1939 births
